||align=center|1||2020 |- | Horoya ||align=center|1||2020 |- | Pyramids ||align=center|1||2020 |} {| |- |align=center|Team in Bold: || ||Finalist team in season |} ==Records and statistics== The following is a list of clubs that have played in the CAF Confederation Cup. The list is arrayed in order of number of clubs reached groups stage. 408 clubs participated in the Confederation Cup (14 editions, as of 2017), 220 teams participated only once. 75 teams from 24 countries qualified to group stage. ===Group stage qualification=== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Nation !# !Club !Group stage qualification |- | rowspan=4| Algeria (4)||align="center"| 2 || JS in bold qualified for the knockout phase (2004-2008 for final, 2009-2016 for semifinal, since 2017 for quarter finals). Years marked with *: qualified from Champions League. ===Records=== Last updated after 2020 semi finals Most titles: 3 CS Sfaxien in 2007, 2008, 2013 Most appearances: 10 CS Sfaxien (2007-2010, 2012-2013, 2015, 2017, 2019, 2020) Most consecutive appearances: 9 Al-Ahly Shendi (2012-) Most consecutive matches without losing: 13 Étoile du Sahel recorded best undefeated streak through two seasons: 2006 (10 games) and 2008 (3 games) Undefeated through whole season: Étoile du Sahel 2006 in 10 games (8-2-0 record) Most goals scored in a season: 34 Raja Casablanca 2018 Most goals conceded in a season: 25 105 Libreville 2005 Biggest win: 11 goals margin US Bitam - Desportivo de Guadalupe 12-1 (2 March 2013) Biggest aggregate win: 16 goals margin US Bitam - Desportivo de Guadalupe 17-1 (0-5, 12-1; 17 February, 2 March 2013) Most goals scored in a single game: 13 US Bitam - Desportivo de Guadalupe 12-1 (2 March 2013) Top goalscorer in a single season: 12 Mahmoud Benhalib 2018 ====Group stage records==== Most group stage appearances: 7 CS Sfaxien (2007, 2008, 2010, 2013, 2015, 2017, 2019) Étoile du Sahel (2006, 2008, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2019) Most consecutive group stage appearances: 4 Étoile du Sahel (2013-2016) Most times advanced past group stage: 6 CS Sfaxien Most time advanced past group stage as group winners: 5 CS Sfaxien Most times eliminated in group stage: 3 Haras El Hodoud Interclube Most times qualified to group stage but failed to go past it: 3 Haras El Hodoud Most group stage matches played: 36 Étoile du Sahel Most group stage matches won: 28 Étoile du Sahel Most appearances without group stage qualification: 6 Sahel SC Most teams from one nation/league: 18 Elite One; 12 teams qualified only once, three teams managed to qualify to group stage Fewest teams from one nation/league: 2 Cape Verdean Football Championship; no teams played in the competition, only league without Confederation Cup representative (2004-2020) Undefeated through group stage: The following teams went undefeated through the group stage, with CS Sfaxien being the only team to achieve this feat twice . FAR Rabat 2005 (5-1-0) Dolphins 2005 (4-2-0) Étoile Sahel 2006 (6-0-0 record) Maghreb de Fès 2011 (4-2-0) Al-Merreikh 2012 (4-2-0) CS Sfaxien 2013 (4-2-0) and 2019 (3-3-0) FUS Rabat 2016 (3-3-0) TP Mazembe 2017 (3-3-0) SuperSport United 2017 (2-4-0) Al-Masry 2018 (3-3-0) Horoya 2020 (4-2-0) Zanaco 2020 (2-4-0) Winless in group stage: The following teams went winless through the group stage with no teams doing it more than once. Fello Star 2005 (0-0-6 joint record) ASFAN 2010 (0-2-4) Haras El Hodoud 2010 (0-3-3) JS Kabylie 2011 (0-0-6 joint record) Stade Malien 2012 (0-3-3) ASEC 2014 (0-3-3) CS Sfaxien 2015 (0-2-4) Al-Ahli Tripoli 2016 (0-2-4) Platinum Stars 2017 (0-3-3) CF Mounana 2017 (0-0-6 joint record) UD Songo 2018 (0-3-3) Al-Hilal 2018 (0-3-3) Salitas 2019 (0-4-2) FC San Pédro 2020 (0-3-3) FC Nouadhibou 2020 (0-2-4) Bidvest Wits 2020 (0-2-4) ESAE 2020 (0-1-5) All (6) losses in group stage: Fello Star 2005 JS Kabylie 2011 CF Mounana 2017 (0-0-6) Most goals scored in group stage (single season): 15 Étoile du Sahel 2006 Most goals scored in group stage (total): 50 Étoile du Sahel Most goals conceded in group stage (single season) 17: Renacimiento 2006 Most goals conceded in group stage (total): 30 Étoile du Sahel Fewest goals scored in group stage: 1 JS Kabylie 2011, 1-9 goal difference Salitas 2019, 1-4 goal difference ESAE 2020, 1-14 goal difference Best goal difference in group stage: +12 Étoile Sahel 2006, 15-3 goal-difference Worst goal difference in group stage: -13 ESAE 2020, 1-14 goal difference Biggest win in a group stage match: 6 goals margin Ismaily - FC 105 6-0 (25 September 2005) ES Sétif - Santos 6-0 (28 August 2009) Raja Casablanca - Aduana Stars 6-0 (29 August 2018) Pyramids - FC Nouadhibou 6-0 (8 December 2019) Most goals scored in a group stage match: 8 CF Mounana - SuperSport United 3-5 (23 May 2017) == References == == External links == * http://www.cafonline.com/ Category:CAF Confederation Cup Category:International association football competition records and statistics
title: CAF Confederation Cup records and statistics
